item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans:

It's time time to check out the Masacote Dance School that I am always talking about.  Here's your chance to see what Masacote has to offer..... FOR FREE!!!!

"FREE OPEN HOUSE at The Masacote Dance School This Saturday, March 17th, The Masacote Dance School will be opening up its doors to the public for a series of sample classes!

Get a FREE SAMPLING of ALL our classes and meet the staff, and Learn more about all the revolutionary changes Masacote will be undertaking in t...he upcoming months. We want to tell you what we are all about!

View our schedule below, and BRING YOUR FRIENDS! There will be raffle prizes, finger food, performances, mixing, mingling, and social dancing!

* FIRST 5 PEOPLE THROUGH THE DOOR GET A FREE INSTRUCTIONAL DVD!
** 10% DISCOUNT ON APRIL CLASSES FOR EVERYONE WHO SIGNS UP AT THE OPEN HOUSE!!!

We hope to see you there!

Visit Website for Schedule and Info!
http://masacote.com/spring2012-open-house"

 

"Schedule for The Masacote School's FREE Open House
DOORS OPEN AT 12:30PM!

Everyone is welcome!
20 Minute Sample Classes offered for ALL LEVELS throughout the day! Door Prizes will be offered THROUGHOUT the day!

12:30pm Welcome & Check In

1:00pm Styling with Ana Masacote

1:30pm Body Movement & Guaguanco (for Men & Women) with Aaron Damus

2:00pm Level 1 Introductory Salsa with Maylena Chaviano
Transitional On 2 for On 1 Dancers class with Aaron Damus

2:30pm Level 1 Introductory Salsa with Maylena Chaviano
Level 2 & 3 Salsa with Aaron Damus
Level 4-6 Salsa with Ana Masacote

3:15pm Casino Rueda with Amanda Gill

3:45pm Showtime! Demos by Masacote School Staff. Q&A Panel

4:30pm Social Dancing & Mix and Mingle

5:30pm End Time

------------------------
FIRST 5 PEOPLE THROUGH THE DOOR GET A FREE INSTRUCTIONAL DVD!

Other Door Prizes:

-- DVDS
-- CDS
-- Arm Wallets
-- Discount Certificates for Burju Shoes
-- Private Lesson Discount Certificates
-- AND MORE!"

 

Here is the Facebook link

http://www.facebook.com/#!/events/125094600951303/

 

I would like to meet at 12:00pm so that everyone can get to know each other.  Don't forget to look for the black fedora hat.

 

See you there !!

 

-Angel
item.how_to_find_us: I will be near the entrance wearing a black fedoral hat near the entrance.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: FREE OPEN HOUSE at The Masacote Dance School
